extendedInfo.description: XML is the language of choice for data exchange between web applications.JavaScript is a language widely used language in the web world, you can run tasks in our web browser.If your web browser asks XML data to a web server, you can use the JavaScript language to try and to show the user the XML received.The agenda of this manual XML JAVASCRIPT comprises:1.- XML HTTP REQUEST The XMLHTTPRequest object used to send and receive data from a web server using JAVASCRIPT.2.- XML ANALYZERAn XML parser is used to convert an XML file into an XML DOM object that can be manipulated in JAVASCRIPT3.- XML DOMXML DOM is a standard way of accessing and manipulating XML documents. 4.- External XML web ViewYou can display an external XML5.- Internal XML web ViewYou can also display an XML created in their own website 6.- XML HTML DATAWe can generate a web page with information from an XML file 7.- XML ProgramsTAGS: XML JAVASCRIPT TUTORIAL, LEARN XML JAVASCRIPT, XML TUTORIAL, LEARN DATA INTERCHANGE, XML DATA, LEARN XML.

reviews.title: B-not Secure
reviews.comment: Developer has caused the latest \'update\' to gather Location and Network Traffic Information.  This is App is a teaching tool if you realize that IT is suspect.  Decline update, remove App and research XML safely.
reviews.author: A Google User
